name: Mini project 1 : A simple resume web Page
tagline: Creating a simple static resume web page with HTML and CSS
body:
#Congratulation on finishing your first HTML & CSS course, and Welcome to your first mini Project.

So, Me being Imaginative, i opened up pages app on my mac, and looked for a sample resume template. and i think i found what i was looking for. the template is called "Business Resume". Our job in this project is to mimic its design.

Project Prototype :

![Project prototype](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UoPeopleComputerScience/miniProject1-simpleResume/master/prototype.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
